summary: Frontend testing of CollageDisplay and SlideshowDisplay components. Both display modes load correctly, transitions work smoothly, and all controls function as expected. Minor visual observation: some photos in the gallery have embedded white frames/borders (social media screenshots) which appear as 'white borders' in the collage - this is photo content, not a CSS issue.

issues: Some photos in gallery have embedded white frames (social media screenshots) which may appear as visual inconsistencies in the mosaic layout - this is photo content, not a CSS bug

passed_tests: CollageDisplay shows 11 photo tiles in mosaic layout
CollageDisplay transitions work - photos change every 7 seconds (default)
CollageDisplay preloads images (22/22 images loaded successfully)
CollageDisplay settings panel opens and closes
CollageDisplay interval slider changes update interval (tested 3s-15s range)
CollageDisplay fullscreen button present and clickable
CollageDisplay no loading spinners visible during viewing
SlideshowDisplay shows single photo with smooth fade transitions
SlideshowDisplay progress bar present and updates

collage_display.notes: All 11 tiles render correctly, transitions use opacity-based crossfade, no CSS gaps between tiles, preloading works

slideshow_display.notes: Single photo display with smooth fade transitions, progress bar shows position, controls work correctly

controls.notes: Pause/play, settings panel with interval slider, fullscreen button all functional

preloading.notes: Images preload before display, 22/22 images loaded successfully, no loading indicators during viewing

auto_refresh.notes: Poll interval configured based on photo count (10s-45s), console logs show [Live] messages for new photos

critical_code_review_comments: CollageDisplay.jsx uses individual tile crossfade transitions with opacity-based animation (1.2s ease-in-out)
Image preloading implemented with imageCache Map to prevent re-fetching
Tile layout uses percentage-based positioning for responsive 16:9 aspect ratio
SlideshowDisplay.jsx uses fade transition with 700ms duration
Both components poll for new photos with interval based on photo count
data-testid attributes present on all interactive elements for testing
seed_data_creation: None - used existing gallery 'Ruby and Sapphire's Birthday' with 53 photos
context_for_next_testing_agent: CollageDisplay and SlideshowDisplay components fully tested. Both work correctly with smooth transitions. The 'white border' issue mentioned by user appears to be from photos that have embedded white frames (social media screenshots) rather than CSS gaps. Tile layout uses percentage positioning with no gaps. Preloading works correctly with imageCache.

visual_observations.collage_transitions: Smooth opacity-based crossfade, all 11 tiles transition simultaneously
visual_observations.white_border_analysis: Observed white borders are from photo content (social media screenshots with white frames), not CSS issues. No actual gaps between tiles detected.
visual_observations.loading_experience: No loading spinners visible during normal viewing, initial load shows spinner until photos preloaded
